mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (uid, upw, name, profile_img, gender, birth, postion_code, email, cp, dp_code) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{name}, #{profile_img}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{postion_code}, #{email}, #{cp}, #{dp_code})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE uid = #{uid} AND upw = #{upw}
SELECT count(*) FROM users WHERE uid = #{uid}
SELECT count(*) FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
